name: JR&M
overview:
JR&M is a full-featured applicant tracking and recruiting tool with advanced capabilities.

JR&M offers an applicant tracking solution for companies of any size, with any budget. It facilitates the entire hiring process and automates activities like applicant tracking, recruitment, executive search, temporary staffing, and other HR activities.

JR&M enables staffing agencies and recruiting department track resumes and job openings quickly and contact candidates more promptly and more efficiently than competitors.
Integrated with Jooble, LinkedIn and job boards JR&M coordinates the entire hiring process and provides immediate results with real-time activities status. The easy-to-use tool doesnâ€™t require additional software or special IT service.
